product.title: Chip and Dale’s New Home | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
Chip and Dale’s New Home

In this imaginative Disney tale, Donald and his nephews learn valuable lessons in the art of compromise and sharing. With their sights set on the open waters, the ducks tear down an old shed that is the home of Chip and Dale and use the lumber to build a boat. It’s all smooth sailing until the two chipmunks decide to move aboard.

Tie-in Activity: Take a nature walk with your child, looking for hollowed trees, dens, and other sites of animal homes. Engage your child in a discussion regarding the importance of habitat preservation, and the effects of construction on wildlife.
